title: House for Sale in Rajagiriya
details:
Newly built house is located in a peaceful highly residential and convenient location to access to colombo within Sri Jayawardanapura Municipal area. Parcking available for 2 vehicals with remote shutter gate. pipe borne water supply with centralized overhead tank for storage. roof top beautiful views towards to kotte/ Battaramulla area

Unit 1 :
Consist of Ground floor and Basement with 3 bedrooms,2 barthrooms, Living Area and kitchen. Fully tiled

Unit 2 :
Yet to complete and Has a Seperate entrance from main road
